description: Styles for the Tic Tac Toe frontend application, including variables for colors, layout specifications for the game title, game status, board and squares, and responsive design adjustments.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main container for the Tic Tac Toe application, centered with flexbox.

classes.name: game-title
classes.description: Styles for the game title, including color, font size, and margin.

classes.name: game-status
classes.description: Styles for displaying the current status of the game.

classes.name: board
classes.description: Styles for the game board layout using CSS grid.

classes.name: square
classes.description: Styles for each square in the Tic Tac Toe grid, including dimensions and colors.

classes.name: restart-button
classes.description: Styles for the button to restart the game.
